00030 void init_array(){
00031   arguments_list *ptr;
00032   int n;
00033 
00034   input_arr  = (argument **) malloc(sizeof(argument *) * n_inputs);
00035   ptr = inputs_list;
00036   n = n_inputs;
00037 
00038   while( n-- > 0) {
00039     input_arr[n] = ptr->arg;
00040     ptr=ptr->next;
00041   }
00042 
00043   output_arr  = (argument **) malloc(sizeof(argument *) * n_outputs);
00044   ptr = outputs_list;
00045   n = n_outputs;
00046 
00047   while( n-- > 0) {
00048     output_arr[n] = ptr->arg;
00049     ptr=ptr->next;
00050   }
00051 }
00052 
00054 void init_param() {
00055   inputs_list = (arguments_list *) 0; 
00056   outputs_list = (arguments_list *) 0;
00057   n_inputs = 0;
00058   n_outputs = 0;
00059 }

00061 void display_outputs() {
00062   int i,j;
00063   
00064   printf("the outputs are:\n");
00065   
00066   for(i=0; i<n_outputs; i++) {
00067     printf("@%d:\n",i+1);
00068     printf("\t name: %s\n",output_arr[i]->name);
00069     printf("\t rank: %d\n",output_arr[i]->rank);
00070     if(output_arr[i]->size != (char *)0)
00071       printf("\t size: %s\n",output_arr[i]->size);
00072     if(output_arr[i]->ndims != 0) { 
00073       printf("\t explicit size: \n\t\t");
00074       for(j=0;j<output_arr[i]->ndims;j++)
00075         printf("%s  ",output_arr[i]->dims[j]);
00076       printf("\n");
00077     }
00078     if(output_arr[i]->type != (char *)0)
00079       printf("\t type: %s\n",output_arr[i]->type);
00080     if(output_arr[i]->explicit_type != (char *)0)
00081       printf("\t explicit type: %s\n",output_arr[i]->explicit_type);
00082     if(output_arr[i]->explicit_allocate)
00083       printf("\t data field memory should be explicitly allocated");
00084     if(adic_on) { 
00085       printf("\t isactive: %d\n",output_arr[i]->isactive);
00086       printf("\t isderiv : %d\n",output_arr[i]->isderiv);
00087     }
00088   }
00089   printf("\n");
00090 }

00092 void display_inputs() {
00093   int i,j;
00094 
00095   printf("the inputs are:\n");
00096   
00097   for(i=0; i<n_inputs; i++) {
00098     printf("$%d:\n",i+1);
00099     printf("\t name: %s\n",input_arr[i]->name);
00100     printf("\t rank: %d\n",input_arr[i]->rank);
00101     if(input_arr[i]->size != (char *)0)
00102       printf("\t size: %s\n",input_arr[i]->size);
00103     if(input_arr[i]->ndims != 0) { 
00104       printf("\t explicit size: \n\t\t");
00105       for(j=0;j<input_arr[i]->ndims;j++)
00106         printf("%s  ",input_arr[i]->dims[j]);
00107       printf("\n");
00108     }
00109     if(input_arr[i]->type != (char *)0)
00110       printf("\t type: %s\n",input_arr[i]->type);
00111     if(input_arr[i]->explicit_type != (char *)0)
00112       printf("\t explicit type: %s\n",input_arr[i]->explicit_type);
00113     if(adic_on) { 
00114       printf("\t isactive: %d\n",input_arr[i]->isactive);
00115       printf("\t isderiv : %d\n",input_arr[i]->isderiv);
00116     }
00117   }
00118   
00119   printf("\n");

00122 int search_input(char *s) { 
00123   int i;
00124 
00125   for(i=0;i< n_inputs; i++)  
00126     if( strcmp(input_arr[i]->name,s) == 0)
00127       return i;
00128 
00129   return -1;
00130 }
00131 
00132 int search_output(char *s) { 
00133   int i;
00134   
00135   for(i=0;i< n_outputs; i++)  
00136     if( strcmp(output_arr[i]->name,s) == 0)
00137       return i;
00138 
00139   return -1;
00140 }

00147 void add_output(char *s) {
00148 
00149   argument *ptr ;
00150   arguments_list *tmp;
00151   
00152   ptr = (argument *) malloc(sizeof(argument));
00153   tmp = (arguments_list *) malloc(sizeof(arguments_list));
00154 
00155   ptr->name = (char *) malloc(sizeof(char)*(strlen(s)+1)); // The nullbyte needs space, too!
00156   strcpy(ptr->name,s);
00157 
00158   tmp->arg = ptr;
00159   tmp->next = outputs_list;
00160   outputs_list = tmp ;
00161 
00162   ptr->rank = n_outputs;
00163   ptr->size = (char *) 0;
00164   ptr->ndims = 0;
00165   ptr->dims = (char **) 0;
00166   ptr->type = (char *) 0;
00167   ptr->explicit_type = (char *) 0;
00168   ptr->explicit_allocate = 0;
00169   ptr->isactive = 0;
00170   ptr->isderiv  = 0;
00171 
00172   
00173 }

00182   arguments_list *tmp;

00184   ptr = (argument *) malloc(sizeof(argument));

00188   strcpy(ptr->name,s);
00189 
00190   tmp->arg = ptr;
00191   tmp->next = inputs_list;
00192   inputs_list = tmp ;
00193   
00194   ptr->rank = n_inputs;
00195   ptr->size = (char *) 0;
00196   ptr->ndims = 0;
00197   ptr->dims = (char **) 0;
00198   ptr->type = (char *) 0;
00199   ptr->explicit_allocate = 0;
00200   ptr->explicit_type = (char *) 0;
00201   ptr->isactive = 0;
00202   ptr->isderiv  = 0;
00203  
00204 }

00206 void set_default_name(argument *p, const char *defname) {
00207   int k=0,j;
00208   char *tmp;
00209 
00210   free(p->name); 
00211 
00212   j = p->rank;
00213   tmp = (char *) malloc(sizeof(char)*3); 
00214   if( j < 10 )
00215     tmp[k++] = '0' + j ; 
00216   else {  
00217     tmp[k++] = '0' + j/10;
00218     tmp[k++] = '0' + j%10;
00219   }
00220   tmp[k] = '\0'; 
00221 
00222   p->name = (char *) malloc(sizeof(char)*(strlen(defname)+strlen(tmp)+1)); 
00223   p->name = strcpy(p->name,defname);
00224   p->name = strcat(p->name,tmp);
00225 
00226   free(tmp);
00227 }

00279 
00280 void set_active_size() { 
00281   int i,j;
00282   char *str;
00283 
00284   // the size of the derivative variables = 
00285   //   numel($this) * num_independents
00286   for(i=0;i<n_inputs;i++)  
00287     if(input_arr[i]->isactive) { 
00288       input_arr[i-1]->ndims = 2;
00289       input_arr[i-1]->dims = (char **) malloc(sizeof(char *) * 2);
00290       
00291       str = (char *) malloc(sizeof(char)*(strlen(input_arr[i]->name)+36));
00292       str = strcpy(str,"numel(");
00293       str = strcat(str,input_arr[i]->name);
00294       str = strcat(str,") * amg_num_independents");
00295       input_arr[i-1]->dims[0] = str;
00296 
00297       str = (char *) malloc(sizeof(char)*2);
00298       str[0] = '1'; str[1]='\0'; // strcpy(str,"1");    
00299       input_arr[i-1]->dims[1] = str;
00300     } 
00301 
00302   for(i=0;i<n_outputs;i++)  
00303     if(output_arr[i]->isactive) { 
00304       output_arr[i-1]->ndims = 2;
00305       output_arr[i-1]->dims = (char **) malloc(sizeof(char *) * 2);
00306 
00307       if(output_arr[i]->size != (char *)0) { 
00308          str = (char *) malloc(sizeof(char)*(strlen(output_arr[i]->size)+36));
00309          str = strcpy(str,"numel(");
00310          str = strcat(str,output_arr[i]->size);
00311          str = strcat(str,") * amg_num_independents");
00312       }
00313       else { 
00314          str = (char *) malloc(sizeof(char)*1000);
00315          for(j=0;j<output_arr[i]->ndims;j++) { 
00316            str = strcat(str,output_arr[i]->dims[j]);
00317            str = strcat(str," * ");
00318          }
00319          str = strcat(str,"amg_num_independents");
00320       }
00321       output_arr[i-1]->dims[0] = str;
00322 
00323       str = (char *) malloc(sizeof(char)*2);
00324       str[0]='1'; str[1]= '\0'; // = strcpy(str,"1");   
00325       output_arr[i-1]->dims[1] = str;
00326     }
00327 
00328 }
